body_text:
We need to add a new tab to about:studies that lists the Pioneer studies that a user has participated in (or is currently participating in). Here's a mockup using the pre-Photon styling for about:studies.
Open questions:

Should the tab be visible even if the user has not enrolled in Pioneer?
Is the Learn more link enough of an explanation for what Pioneer is?
What text should go next to the checkbox for controlling enrollment?
What URL should the Learn more link go to? A SUMO page?
Do we expect the page to list Pioneer studies that a user has not participated in yet but are available? Put another way, are users supposed to be able to specifically choose to participate in a single study?
If a user unchecks the opt-in checkbox, should their studies end immediately? If they then re-check them, should they be re-enabled again, or only on next run?
Can a user re-enter a study after they've exited it?

title: Add Pioneer tab to about:studies
body:
We need to add a new tab to `about:studies` that lists the Pioneer studies that a user has participated in (or is currently participating in). [Here's a mockup](https://mozilla.invisionapp.com/share/UC9XM7O9X#/screens/241294331) using the pre-Photon styling for about:studies.

Open questions:
- Should the tab be visible even if the user has not enrolled in Pioneer?
- Is the Learn more link enough of an explanation for what Pioneer is?
- What text should go next to the checkbox for controlling enrollment?
- What URL should the Learn more link go to? A SUMO page?
- Do we expect the page to list Pioneer studies that a user has not participated in _yet_ but are available? Put another way, are users supposed to be able to specifically choose to participate in a single study?
- If a user unchecks the opt-in checkbox, should their studies end immediately? If they then re-check them, should they be re-enabled again, or only on next run?
- Can a user re-enter a study after they've exited it?
